column5: The GF and I went perchin' last night and landed a few nice suprises! The perch bite was non-stop. We took home 6 perch over 10" and one spec over 15".  I heard rumors of specs in this lake.... rumor confirmed      Note to self, point camera away from sun.
nice spec  nice his and her shades
Ha, funny you say that. Countless times I've accidentally grabbed her shades.
Not buying it.  Nice fish. Keep that little gem real quiet.
Very cool...  Your lucky to have so many lakes close by to mix things up a bit...
Says the guy that lives right by the St. Lawrence......     That's awesome, it's always great to catch a surprise. Especially when it's as tasty as trout!
I get sick of current sometimes....
That's about the best surprise catch I could think of.  Usually it's the other way around...
It's always good when you get some new species in a certain lake...Looks like a good day for you too...

Come on man! It's awesome when you establish the pattern and have everything fire on all cylinders, then the next cast the current totally changes everything, lol.  I hear ya bro.  Awesome surprise RC!!!!!! Thanks for the Repor
Sweet! Accidentally stumbling onto fish is one of the best feelings while fishing!
Get your own shades eh    I'd take that type of surprise any day   Beauty speck Chad  You look like you've landed from the heavens in that last pic
That was the angel guiding me to the speckled trout.
Great surprise! Canoe looks like working very well for you too.
Hard to be disappointed when a surprise like that happens  . I definitely have to try fishing some of the lakes and streams up your way for brookies.
